title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Virtual Network Control System Design: Simulation-Based Disaster Recovery (DR)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operating principles of a TD3-based adaptive controller and compare it with conventional VSG control methods.
Learners can implement a virtual network control model using the DRL Toolbox in a MATLAB/Simulink environment.
Learners can analyze simulation results and write a report evaluating system stability and disturbance resistance capabilities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
